member.name: T:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.AlgorithmsController
member.summary: API Controller for demonstrating C# algorithm implementations Problems 1-3 from the Alex Lee Developer Exercise

member.name: M:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.AlgorithmsController.InterleaveStrings(AlexLee.Api.Controllers.StringInterleaveRequest)
member.summary: Problem 1: String Interleaving Interleave two strings character by character Example: "abc" + "123" = "a1b2c3"

member.name: M:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.AlgorithmsController.CheckPalindrome(AlexLee.Api.Controllers.PalindromeCheckRequest)
member.summary: Problem 2: Palindrome Check Check if a string is a palindrome (ignoring case, spaces, and punctuation)

member.name: M:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.AlgorithmsController.SearchFiles(AlexLee.Api.Controllers.FileSearchRequest)
member.summary: Problem 3: Parallel File Search Search for a string across all files in a directory (demo version with file list)
member.returns: Search results including file count and occurrences

member.name: T:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.PurchaseDetailsController
member.summary: API Controller for managing Purchase Detail items Implements full CRUD operations and filtering capabilities

member.summary: Get all purchase detail items with optional filtering

member.summary: Get a specific purchase detail item by ID

member.name: M:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.PurchaseDetailsController.UpdatePurchaseDetail(System.Int64,AlexLee.Application.Commands.UpdatePurchaseDetailCommand)

member.name: M:AlexLee.Api.Controllers.PurchaseDetailsController.GetDuplicatePurchaseDetails
member.summary: Get duplicate purchase detail items Implements SQL Problem #5: Identify duplicate records
